phrases: I clawed my way up to C-1, the same as you,
driven by desperation and thoughts of the day I would play against you.
So why cannot we play against each other?
We had more matches together at the kids' tournaments back in elementary school!
There was no point in becoming a professional!
Then, we will just have to...
become the winners of the Newcomer Tournament's A Block and B Block,
and go up against each other in the finals, otherwise we will not have
a single match together this year!
Kiriyama, do not tell me you are thinking,
After all, the Newcomer Tournament is full of newbies, so this will be easy.
It is called the Newcomer Tournament, but do not underestimate it!
Um, Kishou Yanagihara, at this current point,
who would you like to support, Meijin Souya or Kumakura 9th-Dan?
Well, I do not want to support either of them.
If I had to sum it up in one word, it would be chaos.
I would go so far as to say you are both arrogant and pompous!
I do not even know which of them is superior.
Where do you get that from?
The prodigy who turned professional in middle school, destined to become Meijin!
Okay, how about, The Meijin Battle's final game is a close contest.
You have been relying on that reputation!
That is what I hate about youngsters.
Do not use words to fight.
Well, it is nice to see some enthusiasm, do not you think?
I wish they would share a little with their mentor.
Recently he is been lacking ambition, right?
It is like he is lost or something.
Like you know, what happened to him?
he kept making moves that were unusual for him.
Maybe Mr. Souya sucked the soul right out of him?
It looks like even his shadow has become lighter, you know?
In fact, his shadow's not the only thing that is been thinning out!
Guys who will never get close to a title match are so happy-go-lucky.
Instead of worrying about another player's mental health,
you should worry about your own life, and the possibility that it could end
without ever being in a title match.
Oh, Kumakura moved his Silver to 3-6.
I thought he might do that.
What are you going to do about this mood?
It is colder than ice in here now.
Everyone who is gotten their butts kicked in a title match
will always lose their composure for a bit.
At this rate, I will just lose.
That is what they come to realize in between matches of a series.
They have to break themselves apart, and then reconstruct it again from the shattered pieces.
They start over from square one.
It is the same for everyone.
Well, by everyone, I mean players who have experienced that.
I am sure if you leave Shimada alone, he will just start winning again.
to see people heckling others when they themselves have not even climbed into the ring.
And so, you are always slashing up everything like a knife itself.
What are you, a middle school student?
Geez, act like an adult already.
We have not been in a title match at all.
So how much time is left?
You do not listen, do you?
Kuma just passed the one hour mark.
Stay away from my sister for now on!
You are married, are not you?
People who cannot cherish their family are trash!
Are you the one who decides all that?
To me, humans are the embodiment of chaos.
The person who got mad on Mr. Shimada's behalf
and the person who makes my older sister suffer
are living in the same body.
Souya moved his Pawn to 3-9, and promoted it.
Does he have time for that?
Do not make Kouda cry too much.
Why do you always have this fierce stance?
Are you saying I look like an ogre?
Then you are already aware of it.
For some reason, I suddenly had the feeling she was near.
The last time I saw her was in March.
I thought about calling her after that,
but I stopped when I reached for the phone.
What should we even talk about?
Even if she were close to me, the one standing next to her is...
Sometimes it will look simple to unravel, but other times it looks messed up and tangled.
If I had to put it in one word...
Then Mr. Yanagihara paused for a moment before muttering...
The seventh game on the second day of the 69th Meijin Battle.
It is been a close contest that has required a full set of games, but this is the final game.
This game will decide the winner.
both players have less time, but their expressions look calm.
Meijin Souya has won five times, totaling 11 wins.
Will he retain the title of Meijin today?
Or will Kumakura 9th-Dan, the challenger for the fourth time in a row, seize the title?
Ah, Meijin Souya has made his move.
What do you think, commentator Mr. Tsujii?
Tsujii 9th-Dan at The Match's Commentary Hall
It is not a Bishop to 3-7 promotion, nor is it a Dragon to 3-7.
It feels like he wasted a move.
It does not have any special meaning.
That is because this is a free-for-all.
It is like saying, Go ahead, think about this.
I do not think even Souya would know what to do anymore.
Then at this stage, could we say Kumakura 9th Dan has a slight advantage?
I am sure Kumakura 9th Dan will do a dodge move next.
He will probably make his move quickly.
Meijin Souya has defended his title!
- The observer is not even in there!
- Hurry! - Where is Mr. Nakamura, the observer?
I mean, I thought he had the upper hand.
But when it is played out, there is no denying it.
At this point, he was trapped, no matter where he moved.
That is all I can say.
For this next year, I will fight off everyone in the rank-deciding competitions
and train hard so I can come back and sit here again.
I want to be like him!
How can he be so calm about it?
Right after a full set of matches?
Starting at square one and fighting through Class A, the den of demons, over and over,
swearing that he will be sitting in front of the champion next year, too...
Here, toner, lotion, and they had a new moisturizing cream, so I tossed that in.
I think that should do it.
I will not stop sneezing if I go into places like that.
Want me to go with you?
I will thank you properly next time.
I picked these up for you.
You were collecting too many claim checks.
I will throw you in a taxi.
If I did that, you would definitely attack me.
Will you walk me to the taxi stand?
Why do not you at least put your dry cleaning inside?
When all is said and done, your defenses are weak, huh?
That is why I take advantage of you.
That is okay, just go to sleep.
And I need to get my makeup off!
He probably has not slept well in a long time.
Now I cannot get mad at you.
Not after you show me this face.
Dan took the early morning limited express train and left Hakone behind.
When we entered the room to clean it this morning...
I thought I should show it to you.
So he kicked the hell out of the wall.
He is definitely going to pay for the damages and a severe penalty!
I will send him to shogi events on department store rooftops during sweltering summer vacation!
To think he would kick a hole in the wall after losing.
It could not have been anything other than frustrating.
First we both have to clear the qualifying round.
I did not know that cool-looking person has been hiding such passion.
On the surface, it seemed cool, like a good match for cold, green tea.
March Comes in Like a Lion.
Please watch it next time too.
I need to talk to you!
